google_reviews.author: Tiffany Varker
google_reviews.review:
We lived at Bellingham Green for one year (it was transitional for us after a move from out of the area until we purchased a house). Our experience was great! The townhouse was beautiful, tons of natural light from windows on 3 sides. A beautiful wooded area is to one side of the property, with a family of resident deer. Neighbors were friendly and respectful. Danny and Samantha are the owner and property manager, respectively, and were super easy to work with, very responsive and worked with us on our home buying timeline. This is one of very few pet friendly complexes in the area, so there are a lot of dogs (we have one too, that's one reason we chose to live there). There are dog waste stations located on the property and it's close to a couple walking trails. Community garden area is very nice amenity. The one drawback is the proximity to Bakerview Rd - it can get pretty noisy at times.
We love our new house, but if we found ourselves in need of an apartment, we would definitely call Samantha!

google_reviews.author: Amy Phillips
google_reviews.review: I wanted to share my pleasurable experience of living at Bellingham Green for the past year. Samantha and Danny were easy to work with and always responsive to any needs or concerns I had which were few if any. I appreciated the fact that they were dog friendly especially with a 76 lb lab which was not easy to find in Bellingham.nowadays The majority of places had so many restrictions but not them they worked with me and had no issue with my request. Also, their rental rates were fair and reasonable for such a nice apartment complex. I highly recommend Bellingham Green as a place to stay.

summary.text:
Good

In this article, Bellingham Green is portrayed positively, particularly in handling tenant relationships. Residents praised the property's natural surroundings and the presence of deer, which added a charming touch to the living experience. The townhouses are highlighted for their beautiful architecture and plentiful natural light, contributing to a pleasant residential environment. Additionally, the community includes dog-friendly facilities and a well-maintained community garden, catering to a variety of tenant needs.

Tenants expressed appreciation for the spaciousness and aesthetic appeal of the apartments, with pet-friendly policies being a significant factor in their choice. The close proximity to walking trails further enhances the quality of living for those who enjoy outdoor activities. These features collectively make Bellingham Green an appealing option for potential tenants seeking convenience and a welcoming community atmosphere.

Great

The user reviews emphasize the high level of responsiveness and professionalism shown by the property management team, specifically Samantha and Danny. Tenants experienced seamless communication and support throughout their stay, with management addressing concerns promptly and cooperatively. This rapport extended to accommodating personal timelines for individuals transitioning to homeownership, showcasing flexibility and understanding.

Beyond management's responsiveness, Bellingham Green's rental rates were cited as fair and competitive, especially given the quality of accommodations offered. The management's openness to large dogs, an uncommon policy in many apartment complexes, was highly valued by tenants with pets. Such policies and fair pricing contribute to the property being highly recommended by past residents.

Bad

While Bellingham Green receives overwhelmingly positive feedback, one area of note from user reviews is the noise level due to its proximity to Bakerview Road. Some tenants found the traffic noise to be a drawback, indicating a potential disturbance for those seeking a quieter living environment. However, this has been the only notable downside, implying that overall satisfaction outweighs the inconvenience of occasional noise.

Ugly

There have been no significant negative accounts that fall into an 'ugly' category for Bellingham Green based on the available user reviews. Both reviews were exceptionally positive, focusing primarily on the helpfulness of the management and the appealing features of the property. Consequently, this section does not contain notable grievances or unresolved issues.
